Ingredients.6: 1 pinch freshly ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Position a rack in the upper third of the oven, and preheat to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).

Directions.2: Mix together olive oil, garlic, and rosemary in a small bowl.

Directions.3: Cut sweet potato lengthwise into 1 1/2-inch thick wedges; place in a large bowl. Season with salt and pepper and drizzle with oil mixture; toss gently to coat. Arrange wedges on a large baking sheet in a single layer so they are not touching.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven, turning once, until potatoes are softened and lightly browned, about 20 minutes. Carefully remove from the baking sheet.
